scripts.setup:deps: npm install && cd functions && npm install && cd ..
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup && npm run setup:deps
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist && git rm -r --cache . && git reset && npm install && npm run build
scripts.devf: npm run env:dev && cd functions && npm run dev
scripts.deve: npm run env:dev && firebase use dev && firebase emulators:start --only hosting:dev,firestore,auth,functions,storage,database
scripts.dev:all: npm run env:dev && npm-run-all -p dev deve devf
scripts.dev:mc: npm run env:dev && cd apps/mass-consensus && npm run dev
scripts.deploy:rules:prod: firebase use wizcol && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,storage
scripts.deploy:rules:dev: firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,storage
scripts.deploy:rules:test: firebase use test && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,storage
scripts.deploy:h:prod: npm run env:prod && npm run build && firebase use wizcol && firebase deploy --only hosting:wizcol && npm run env:dev
scripts.deploy:h:prod:unminified: npm run env:prod && npm run build:prod:unminified && firebase use wizcol && firebase deploy --only hosting:wizcol && npm run env:dev
scripts.deploy:h:dev: npm run build:dev && firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only hosting:dev
scripts.deploy:h:test: npm run env:test && npm run build:test && firebase use test && firebase deploy --only hosting:test && npm run env:dev
scripts.deploy:h:test:minified: npm run build:test:minified && firebase use test && firebase deploy --only hosting:test npm run env:dev
scripts.deploy:f:prod: cd functions && npm run build && firebase use wizcol && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:f:dev: cd functions && npm run build && firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:f:test: cd functions && npm run build && firebase use test && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:fn:prod: cd functions && npm run build && firebase use wizcol && firebase deploy --only
scripts.deploy:fn:dev: cd functions && npm run build && firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only
scripts.deploy:fn:test: cd functions && npm run build && firebase use test && firebase deploy --only
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:h:prod && npm run deploy:f:prod && npm run deploy:rules:prod
scripts.deploy:test: npm run deploy:h:test && npm run deploy:f:test && npm run deploy:rules:test
